full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,

Nearly there.

Please change the thumbnail for the hanging banner to this one.



Is it possible to move the animation image shown on the first row to sit below in the empty space and leave its current spot empty?



Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Nikki, 

Thanks for the below. The only file we are missing (it's not on our version of OneDrive) is the display ads, including the portrait one. 

I have attached the adverts we have on file here. Let me know?

Thanks Heath,

Some changes have not been applied and a couple more edits below. Any chance I can have these completed by COB?

Canvas Banners

The link for the canvas banners goes to one drive instead of downloadable PDFs.

Please note, all three versions of the canvases need to be downloadable as zip.



Hanging Banners

There are two versions of the hanging banners and both need to be downloadable as zip in the one thumbnail. Both assets are available in the one drive link.

Also please update the thumbnail image to the whale version below.



Display stands

Same with the display stands, both versions below need to be downloadable zip.

Also, update thumbnail to the combi van version as shown below.



Email templates

Both email template files are available in the one drive link. I've also attached them.

Display adverts - The portrait version is missing, can you also add the portrait version to be downloaded as a zip. Also can you the portrait version for the thumbnail.



Advertorials

Please use the same thumbnail as blog articles & web content.



Images

Please move family images (below) to sit as the first thumbnail in front of the charger case.



Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

Hi Nikki, 

Apologies on the delay for this task. We have now completed the changes as requested.

Please note, regarding the 'shorter' images (the ones with the larger gap before you see the button) we have now added a line around each tile to better indicate the images association to the button. We have also shortened the tiles for the videos and images as they are the same height. I think this is what you were looking to achieve. Let me know? 

We seem to be missing some files. Can you please send through and we will upload them immediately:

  1. The email templates
  2. The portrait display advert

Hi Heath,

Overall visual changes:

Can we please reduce the font size on the thumbnail titles slightly.

Also is it possible to reduce the space between the header and the thumbnail across all of the assets and remove the dashes as highlighted below?



Can you also reduce the space between the image and the download button across all thumbnails. If the reason for the space is the thumbnail image area, can you place a light grey wash behind the thumbnail images to fill the space. See below example I am refereeing to. Let's chat about this so I can explain it better.



Other updates:

Dummy images: Attached are the images for the dummies. Would you mind brightening them up a bit.

Canvas banners: https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/p/nikki_ozeken/EVrzocea7ghNndAaeLYDx8oBZFwsflO71RpvGHpo6NuZdw?e=Xydlhb

Please upload both banners and use the Aquarium version as the thumbnail.

There should be two downloadable files for each of these. Also please change header to 'Display stands'



Change to 'Counter stand lifestyle'

Emails & letter templates - Can you change this section to show two headers/thumbnails 1. Letter templates and 2 Email templates

Please add the new and existing letter examples into the one Letter templates section and add the email templates together (refer to Onedrive for the assets) into the one Email templates section.



Local area marketing templates

Please organise the LAM section in this order:

Blu marketing guide

Display adverts

Direct mail flyers

Advertorials

Blog articles & web content

Blog articles:

Attached are the blog articles. For the thumbnail can you create a graphical image that depicts a blog article? Otherwise use one of the articles as thumbnail.

Display adverts - The portrait version is missing, can you also add the portrait version to be downloaded as a zip. Also can you the portrait version for the thumbnail.

Social media content - Can you also add the post images to the 'Social media content' folder as a downloadable zip file. Images can be accessed from the image folder in the Onedrive link.



You can delete this 'Social posts' thumbnail.



Images and videos

Please move '15' to the third line.



Please move '15' to the second line.



Can you please re-order the videos as follows:

Blu main campaign video

Blu form factors - 15 seconds

Blu connectivity - 15 seconds

Blu sound performance - 15 seconds

Blu personalisation - 15 seconds

Blu peace of mind - 15 seconds

Blu excitement video - 20 seconds

Blu excitement video - 60 seconds

Can we separate 'Images and videos' section to single sections starting with Videos first and then images as the last.

In the images section, please move the 'Moxi Blu R charger images' as the second last thumbnail atd the 'Blu lifestyle images' as the last thumbnail.

Do you think you can have these changes completed by Monday COB?

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: http://www.phonak.com.au/

full_threads.body:
Hi Nikki, 

We have updated the Unitron Blu digital launch kit:
https://unitronlaunch.com.au/digital-launch-kit/

There are some missing files (or ones that we couldn't locate) in the attached updated Excel. The missing files are in red colour and we have hidden the completed items for clarity. When you have a moment, can you please send the missing ones over and we will add them.

hi, heath. please check the progress here https://unitronlaunch.com.au/digital-launch-kit/

there are still items that i cant determine which file or thumbnail to use, but all the provided images are now uploaded. i just dont know how to match the remaining ones

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body: @glen this is for the unitronlaunch site… I think some of them may already be loaded in. Cheers

Hi Heath,

Please find attached the Blu digital catalogue brief. Please note, there are some slight variations from the one I sent yesterday, so please use the attached version.

Here is the link to all the downloadable assets: https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/nikki_ozeken/EuDT8EJCddhKgO9knLr3AQwBjQNuh6wj41MsOUt3iTKn4g?e=Z1uQJh <https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/nikki_ozeken/EuDT8EJCddhKgO9knLr3AQwBjQNuh6wj41MsOUt3iTKn4g?e=Z1uQJh>

Here is the link to all the asset thumbnails: https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/nikki_ozeken/EmQG2X2XwyJBiTjsFivpsakBY8SmMr0MOmv8vhi3kRLRQA?e=TQEArA <https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/nikki_ozeken/EmQG2X2XwyJBiTjsFivpsakBY8SmMr0MOmv8vhi3kRLRQA?e=TQEArA>

The only thing missing is the individual thumbnails for the videos. I am awaiting these from the designer who is a bit under the pump with other jobs, so could you temporarily slice the below jpg to create the thumbnails as an option.

Ideally we’d like to get this completed by early next week, is this achievable?

Please let me know if anything is missing. Have a great weekend.




Nikki Ozeken
Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Michelle,

Thanks for the below, confirming we have made the below updates. I have noted that Nikki will be in touch with more assets to upload.

I have made sure that when the customer adds their details on https://unitronlaunch.com.au/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Funitronlaunch.com.au%2F&data=04%7C01%7CNikki.Ozeken%40sonova.com%7C8cfdf899eed64836f1f908d92af8d5ec%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637588070500003196%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=UEdrEfJpHFnmMDjXr4FzL146hmwuV1y3XTbvYaD%2FT%2BU%3D&reserved=0> they go directly the digital launch kit. I.e. not to the event page any more.

Christine, lovely to meet you! I look forward to speaking with you at some point. If you need anything let me know, I always try to make myself available for the Sonova team.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

On 9 Jun 2021, at 8:51 am, Mowbray, Michelle <Michelle.Mowbray@phonak.com <mailto:Michelle.Mowbray@phonak.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath
Thanks for updating the Blu digital launch kit.
Requesting a few edits please:
· Please remove all ‘print file’ download buttons – anything they download from the site we want it to be low-res
· For items that have a part number, please add the same ‘Click to order’ link that we have on the Phonak site – this should create the same pop-up email as Phonak but the address will be orders.au@unitron.com <mailto:orders.au@unitron.com>
· Please reduce the size of the part number so it all fits on one line, like on the Phonak page
Nikki will have some items to add for customers to use – images/videos for social media, social media content plan, marketing templates, etc. She’ll work with you on any navigation changes to accommodate this and advise the calls to action (download / click to order / contact us).
I’m also pleased to introduce our new Unitron Marketing Manager, Christine Salvador, copied to this email. Christine will manage all demand generation activities for Unitron, including launch kits/events/communication.
Thanks
Michelle


Michelle Mowbray
Head of Marketing
